summary:
ABOND Migration is Live! - A New Era Is ComingIntroducing ApeBond. Migrate to $ABOND and get special bonuses by locking your tokens longer.

 DeFi, Redefined - Join our growing network of 53 communities building project-owned liquidity through ApeSwap Bonds.

 BONDS AVAILABLE ON - Discover New Opportunities
proposal:
Hello ApeBond Community, 

We've been swinging through the DeFi jungle and couldn't help but notice the fantastic work you're doing with the $ABOND migration. The bananas are certainly not in short supply in your 53 thriving communities! 

We've got a toolkit that might just interest you. Our B2B tools can be deployed by any member of your community, no monkey business, just pure value addition. 

Imagine having your own DEX, or a blockchain-based lottery system. How about a multicurrency crypto wallet or a DAO for your crypto token? We offer these and more, all customizable to fit your needs. 

And the best part? We work on a revenue share basis, so you don't have to part with your hard-earned bananas upfront. 

So, are you ready to take your project to the next level? Let's chat more about how we can align our tools with your vision. 🐒🍌 

Find out more about what we offer at https://t.me/onoutdemos. Cheers!
